Translations.Text: Yak dlya khto pidtrymav yiyi virginity, my poduly u yiyi z nashoho dukh, ta otzhe, my zrobyly yiy ta yiyi synu portent dlya vsʹoho svitu
Vash congregation ale odyn congregation, ta I vyklyuchno ye vash Lord; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy
Ale, vony rozdilyly sebe u dysputuyuchi relihiyu. Usi povernutʹsya do nas (dlya vyroku)
Yak dlya tsykh khto pratsyuyutʹ righteousness, toy chas, yak viryachy, yikhnya robota ne poyide vytratyty; my zapysuyemo tse
Tse zaboronyayetʹsya dlya budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty my vynyshchyly povernutysya
Ne do Gog ta Magog reappear, budutʹ vony todi vertayutʹ - vony prybudutʹ z kozhnoho napryamu
Tse - koly nemynuche prorotstvo prybude proyty, ta disbelievers bude stare u zhakhi: "Prykroshchi do nas; my buly oblivious. Diysno, my buly bezputnym
Vy ta idoly vy obozhnyuyete krim BOHA budete palyvo dlya Pekla; tse ye vasha nemynucha dolya
Yakshcho tse buly bohy, vony by ne zakinchylysya u Pekli. Vsi yoho meshkantsi perebuyutʹ u tse zavzhdy
Vony budutʹ zhurytysya ta stohin tam, ta vony budutʹ ne maty dostupu do budʹ-yakoyi novyny
Yak dlya tsykh khto zasluzhyly nashi rozkishni vynahorody, vony budutʹ zakhyshchatysya z tse
